custom-action.name: connect
custom-action.description:
Connect to an MQTT broker.
Possible parameters are: - BrokerAlias (optional): Alias identifying the broker in all further interactions with it. If User Path connects to one broker only, this parameter can be left out. - Protocol (optional): Protocol used to communicate with the MQTT broker. Defaults to the only supported protocol: "tcp". Default value is "tcp". - Host (optional): Host of the MQTT broker (IP address or domain name). Default value is "localhost". - Port (optional): Port number of the MQTT broker. Defaults to 1883. Default value is "1883". - UserName (optional): Username for authenticating and authorizing the client on the MQTT broker. - Password (optional): Password for authenticating and authorizing the client on the MQTT broker. - ClientId (optional): Identifier of the MQTT client connecting to the MQTT broker (expected to be unique per broker, default is a randomly generated client identifier guaranteed to be unique per User Path and per Load Generator).
